# Shields

## PicoBricks

-   Device: [Raspberry Pi Pico W](/devices/rp2040/pico-w)
-   [GitHub](https://github.com/pelikhan/devicescript-pico-bricks)

![PicoBricks image](https://camo.githubusercontent.)

## WaveShare Pico-LCD

-   Device: [Raspberry Pi Pico W](/devices/rp2040/pico-w)
-   [GitHub](https://github.com/mmoskal/devicescript-waveshare-pico-lcd)

![WaveShare Image](https://github.com/mmoskal/devicescript-waveshare-pico-lcd/blob/main/assets/pico-lcd-114.png?raw=true)

:::tip

See [Add shield](/devices/add-shield) to learn how to package and publish your own shield package.

:::
